protected_spaces_details.description: Provision for children and young people

description: Demolition of 1, 3-5 Valentine Place and 27-31 Webber Street and part demolition of 7-19 Valentine Place and 21 Webber Street (facades retained). Redevelopment of the site to provide 62 residential units (max 7 storeys), 3854sqm Class B1 (business) and 138sqm A1/A3 (retail and food and drink) floorspace, together with landscaping and car parking.
